agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Insurance TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, April 30, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Eddie Lucio III HB 3103 Lucio III Relating to standardization of insurance and health maintenance organization disclosures. HB 3325 Oliverson Relating to the administration of a temporary health insurance risk pool. SB 439 Perry Relating to the application of certain insurance regulations to certain small employer health reimbursement arrangements. Bills deleted after last posting: HB 4435 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
